name: One day One Chance
description:
One day one choice is about the story of a dad going back to home looking for his daugther and wife
because the world is gonna end with a zombie apocalypse, he can only choose his wife OR his daugther after that the house crumbles into oblivion leaving behind the one not chosen
after that you need to get resources in a supermarket then into a shellter

credits:
Code made by Sen

Models and animations made by me
